a6d7487f-be5e-45e0-ab9d-7bd8d987f556.name: Bakunin
a6d7487f-be5e-45e0-ab9d-7bd8d987f556.description:
Brewery from Sain-Petersburg, Russia. We are brewing fair, high quality and uncommon beer for each and everyone.
Beers are brewed in different locations.

40495654-0d6b-49df-af72-6d2ff8eae1ce.name: Wild Isabella
40495654-0d6b-49df-af72-6d2ff8eae1ce.description: One of our first wild experiences. Ale fermentad by wild yeast and bacteria cocktail. Barrel aged in red wine barrels with Isabella grape.

cea6c8bb-5f5e-4920-b11e-ed83658f73a0.name: Wild Cherry
cea6c8bb-5f5e-4920-b11e-ed83658f73a0.description: American Wild Ale Red Wine BA with Cherries

ce2a4f6c-4029-47c8-b8e3-d2999541acb3.name: Delhi Express
ce2a4f6c-4029-47c8-b8e3-d2999541acb3.description: A hybrid of farmhouse ale and American IPA. Powerfull blackcurrant and tropical fruits aroma combined with traditional saison taste and aroma.

275818d4-ce7a-4072-8c68-d4b0aa7dbbf8.name: Salty Dog
275818d4-ce7a-4072-8c68-d4b0aa7dbbf8.description: A Russian Gose brought back from Berlin by Rachel.

7901fc1e-ff14-4a36-a699-089bee1ee3a5.name: Eclipse
7901fc1e-ff14-4a36-a699-089bee1ee3a5.description: Pours jet black, bright and with a moka-coloured thick head. Aroma is intense: booze, caramel, smoke, tobacco. also tar,
